TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ImmutableArray extends System.Object
public ref class ImmutableArray abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides methods for creating an array that is immutable; meaning it cannot be changed once it is created.

span.span: Provides methods for creating an array that is immutable; meaning it cannot be changed once it is created.

summary.span: Searches the sorted immutable array for a specified element using the default comparer and returns the zero-based index of the element, if it’s found.

span.span: Searches the sorted immutable array for a specified element using the default comparer and returns the zero-based index of the element, if it’s found.

returns.span: The zero-based index of the item in the array, if item is found; otherwise, a negative number that is the bitwise complement of the index of the next element that is larger than or, if there is no larger element, the bitwise complement of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載可讓有效建立根據現有，其中對應函式必須要套用至每個項目從來源陣列。This overload allows efficient creation of an based on an existing , where a mapping function needs to be applied to each element from the source array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載可讓有效建立根據現有的配量，其中對應函式必須要套用至每個項目從來源陣列，包含在產生的陣列。This overload allows efficient creation of an based on a slice of an existing , where a mapping function needs to be applied to each element from the source array included in the resulting array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載可讓有效建立根據現有的配量，其中對應函式必須要套用至每個項目從來源陣列，包含在產生的陣列。This overload allows efficient creation of an based on a slice of an existing , where a mapping function needs to be applied to each element from the source array included in the resulting array.
